from that experience was we needed to have an organization that actually was ready for the cloud so when I was there
about two years we retracted from cloud chaos put some governance and some process in place and actually got to a

in our case you know we focused on moving from a hero culture you know to a

and we wanted to move that to a team culture where we focus on the team we
reward the team we focus on predictable delivery all the goodness that you get

the final shift is really going from kind of Silo organizations to
